trans-unit.source: Provides a dialog box, which prompts for account information of a Windows Service application.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个对话框，提示输入的 Windows 服务应用程序的帐户信息。

trans-unit.source: Normally, you do not use the ServiceInstallerDialog class directly within your code; this dialog is generally used by the installation utility for a Windows Service application.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，不使用 ServiceInstallerDialog 类直接在代码中;此对话框通常由安装实用程序用于 Windows 服务应用程序。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller> object has the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Account%2A> set to `User`, and either the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A> is an empty string (""), then the installation utility uses ServiceInstallerDialog to prompt for these values.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller>对象具有<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Account%2A>设置为`User`，并且<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A>或<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A>为空字符串 ("")，然后安装实用工具使用 ServiceInstallerDialog 提示输入这些值。</xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Account%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller>

trans-unit.source: ServiceInstallerDialog derives from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>; use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class methods and properties to display and manipulate the dialog.
trans-unit.target: ServiceInstallerDialog 派生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>; 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>类方法和属性来显示和处理对话框。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: For example, use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> to display the form, and then check the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A> before validating the input text for the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>要显示窗体，然后检查<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A>之前验证的输入的文本<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A>和<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A>属性。</xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > ServiceInstallerDialog does not check the credentials and privileges for the specified account.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> ServiceInstallerDialog 不会检查的凭据和指定的帐户的权限。

trans-unit.source: For example, the user might enter an invalid account name and password for the computer, or the account might not have the correct privileges to run as a service.
trans-unit.target: 例如，用户可以为计算机上，输入的无效帐户名和密码或帐户可能没有正确的权限，来作为服务运行。

trans-unit.source: Validate the user input to ensure that the installed service runs successfully.
trans-unit.target: 验证用户输入，以确保已安装的服务成功运行。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the service account form.
trans-unit.target: 初始化服务帐户窗体的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> form has its <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A> set to <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult>, the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> set to an empty string (""), and the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> set to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 一个新<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>窗体具有其<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A>设置为<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult>、<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A>设置为空字符串 ("")，和<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A>设置为空字符串。</xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>

trans-unit.source: Begins running a standard application message loop and displays the service account form.
trans-unit.target: 开始运行标准应用程序消息循环，并显示服务帐户窗体。

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName> on a new <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> form; it is typically used for testing purposes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法等效于调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName>上的新<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>窗体; 它通常用于以进行测试。</xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> on the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> form to display the dialog box in your application.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>上<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>窗体，以在你的应用程序中显示的对话框。</xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the password for the service account form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置服务帐户窗体的密码。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> does not validate the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> and Password values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>不会验证<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A>和密码值。</xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>

trans-unit.source: The dialog checks that the user confirms the password, but it does not authenticate the account credentials on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 该对话框可以检查用户确认密码，但不验证身份的计算机上的帐户凭据。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the password in the service account form.
trans-unit.target: 表示服务帐户窗体中的密码的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets the dialog result for the service account form.
trans-unit.target: 获取服务帐户窗体的对话框结果。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> to prompt the user for the service installation account, then check the Result value.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>要提示用户输入服务安装帐户，然后检查的结果值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult>, verify that the input <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> are valid.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult>，验证输入<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A>和<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A>有效。</xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult"></xref> indicating the user response to the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult"> </xref> ，该值指示用户响应对话框中的。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_OK" name="OK" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_OK" name="OK" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user name for the service account form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置服务帐户窗体的用户名。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> does not validate the Username or <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>不会验证用户名或<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A>值。</xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>

trans-unit.source: A string representing the user name in the service account form.
trans-unit.target: 表示服务帐户窗体中的用户名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。
